transcript.text: hi and welcome you listening to the x 22

if you are on the x 22 report com email

or you can come over to the x 22 report

now the United States government uses

board their model shows that everything
is trending downward in a declining
basically gallops economic confidence
registered at negative 13 for the week

they're saying you know something I can

we're seeing this out in the retail

and we understand those youths that are

remember the
